CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Email )) , HYPERLINK("https://www.xometry.com/staff/quotes-list/?search="+ SUBSTITUTE(Email, "@", "%40") +"&rowsPerPage=25&page=1&sortBy=last_updated&sortDirection=desc","Go to this Contact's Quotes in the ERP", "_blank"), "No Email Provided on Contact")
CustomField.label: ERP Contact Quotes
